resources.string: Write a word in Spanish and its meaning in English to add to the Dictionary
It will show a check if the answer is correct or a X if its wrong
You failed again!, you will have an extra oportunity soon!
Dictionary is empty, you can introduce some words hitting the Add Words button
You must click Show Word button to start playing
You must first introduce a word in English to check it
You must enter a word in English and in Spanish aswell
